h2_title: Where to use Skandha of Thought Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Skandha of Thought can be taken to Mount Huago in Chapter 6, alongside the Skandha of Form, Skandha of Feeling, Skandha of Choice. Upon accessing the Cloud ability herer, you can head towards an enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Thought.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Thought', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use Skandha of Thought Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Skandha of Thought can be taken to Mount Huago in Chapter 6, alongside the Skandha of Form, Skandha of Feeling, Skandha of Choice. Upon accessing the Cloud ability herer, you can head towards an enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang.
